question: Hi, I've had a dry throat right at the back behind my tongue, kind of on the roof of my gum and around the adams apple part. I am a healthy weight and fit and do not have any history of diabetes in the family so I am unsure what I should do or what you people think it is, It seems to be better than from a few days ago ?
title: Dry Throat
